page.title: 05A DAY IN THE LIFE OF -
page.content: A day in the life of Alexander Ingram I wake up at 7.30am. After brushing my teeth I get dressed, comb my hair and feed my unusual Siamese Fighters with bloodworms. Then at 7.45 I have breakfast,which is Frosties, not bloodworms. At 8.00 I wait for the bus which comes at 8.15. It is a 30 min. trip to Holy Family school. We arrive at 8.45 but school starts at 9.00 so we play in the playground. After prayers we go to maths which is my favourite subject. We stop for playtime at 10.30. We cpme in after 15 mins. and do creative writing. We stop at 12.15 for lunch. After this, and a play outside it is 1.15. When we come in we do prayers then RE. for one hour and a project for 45 mins. We get out at 3.15. I arrive home at 3.45. I feed my fish and look at them until 4.00. I then watch TV and draw lots of things.
